name: Adventure 2600 Reboot
storyline: A dastardly magician has stolen the Enchanted Chalice and hidden it somewhere throughout the kingdom. As the hero, it's your job to brave this treacherous land, slay the dragons, and recovery the chalice in order to restore peace to all.
summary: Nearly 30 years after the original Atari 2600 classic comes a fan-made remake by PA G&T! Experience the game that pioneered the titular genre with 16-bit graphics, music, and other quality-of-life features. Explore the kingdom, collect the keys, and recover the Enchanted Chalice, lest the fearsome dragons eat you first. Try the game on different difficulty modes, or even customize your game for maximum enjoyment. Everything you remember and more are here in Adventure 2600 Reboot, the fresh coat of paint Atari never even made!
